text:
Hey party people :raised_hands: Sandra here from <http://playplay.com/|PlayPlay>, a super simple online video creator based in Paris :fr: _(think ‘Canva’ for video creation; and yes, I know they also have a video maker but we’re more geared towards larger, in-house marcomm teams_ :sweat_smile:_)_ 

I lead content and co-marketing partnerships so I oversee everything from our blog, downloadable content, social media, webinars, and virtual events. I’worked in B2B SaaS for quite some time :older_woman: previously running content at Mention and social media at Hootsuite. Let’s chat *#videomarketing* ! Enchanté :wave:

attachments.title: PlayPlay | Online Video Maker | Professional video made easy
attachments.text: Create professional videos in minutes with PlayPlay, the simplest online video maker. No technical skills needed. 7-day free trial.
attachments.fallback: PlayPlay | Online Video Maker | Professional video made easy

text: Hi all - Bryan Strawser here, I’m CEO at <https://bryghtpath.com|Bryghtpath>, a crisis management & business continuity consultancy in the Twin Cities of Minneapolis and Saint Paul in the US.  Since there are only five of us, I manage most of our content marketing, social media, website, etc.  - sometimes through our own team creating content and sometimes working with outside writers and editors.  I’m here mostly to learn and seek some help from time to time.  Glad to be here!

attachments.title: Bryghtpath | Business Continuity & Crisis Management Consultants
attachments.text: Manage your organization's risks with business continuity, crisis management, workplace violence, and crisis communications solutions from Bryghtpath
attachments.fallback: Bryghtpath: Bryghtpath | Business Continuity & Crisis Management Consultants

text: Hello everyone! I'm a content marketer at <https://thisisoutcast.com|Outcast>—a digital marketing, design and communications agency—which works with brands like Facebook, Amazon/AWS/Alexa, HBO, TurboTax, SoFi and more.  We create and support podcasts, long form thought leadership, newsletters, blog programs and social media campaigns. Look forward to meeting and learning from everyone!

attachments.title: We are Outcast — digital, communications, creative
attachments.text: We are an integrated marketing agency — we’ve been shaping the brands that shape the future for over 24 years.

text: Hi, I’m Keriann, director of content and product marketing at <http://www.submittable.com|Submittable>, a B2B SaaS for managing social impact programs (think grants, corporate giving, awards etc). Looking forward to learning from the group!

attachments.text: Submission management made simple. Accept, review, and make decisions on any kind of content using our cloud-based submissions manager.

text:
Hi everybody -- I'm Nate, content lead at <https://www.notion.so/product|Notion> (where we recently launched our <https://www.notion.so/blog|blog>!). Right now, I'm working on strategy and execution as we look to expand our content program.

I have a background in journalism, PR, and creative writing. Before Notion, I ran comms and editorial at direct-to-consumer nutrition brand, <https://hvmn.com/|HVMN>. I'm always happy to discuss writing, content strategy, team building, and more. Excited to be here!
